employees.notes: Proff lists the company with 66 employees (Antall ansatte 66) on the company profile page [1].

revenue.notes: Proff reports operating revenue as "Sum driftsinntekter 2024 137 197" and states amounts are "Beløp i 1000"; converted to NOK 137,197,000 [1].

company.entity_resolution_notes: Proff identifies the legal entity as HEIDELBERG MATERIALS NORWAY AS with org.nr 980910369 [1]. The stated corporate purpose is to own/finance other companies, which increases uncertainty about direct operating inputs at this parent entity level [1].

srm_assessment.overall_summary: No entity-specific evidence was found that HEIDELBERG MATERIALS NORWAY AS itself uses secondary raw materials as inbound inputs. Public Heidelberg Materials Norway-country text describes alternative fuels for subsidiary cement operations, not explicitly this legal entity [1][2].
gaps_and_uncertainties: No standalone sustainability/ESG or permit source was identified that quantifies inbound SRM inputs specifically for org.nr 980910369 [1].
Heidelberg Materials' Norway country page attributes alternative-fuel use to subsidiary cement production, so attribution to this exact legal entity remains uncertain [2].

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn HEIDELBERG MATERIALS NORWAY AS Org nr 980 910 369
evidence.claim: Confirms legal entity name and organization number.
Shows financial figures are reported in thousands of NOK.
Supports 2024 operating revenue figure before thousand-to-NOK conversion.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Å eie andre selskaper innen handel og/eller industri, herunder å stifte, delta i og lede samt finansiere andre enheter
evidence.claim: Indicates parent-company ownership/financing purpose rather than clearly disclosed direct production inputs.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Our subsidiary Heidelberg Materials Sement Norge is the only cement producer in Norway with plants in Brevik in southern Norway and Kjøpsvik
evidence.claim: Attributes cement production to a subsidiary, not explicitly to the parent legal entity.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Our cement production is characterized by a high proportion of alternative fuels.
evidence.claim: Indicates SRM-like fuel use at Norway operations, but entity-level attribution is unclear.
